TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RoutingExtension extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.IExtension`1<class System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>
Public NotInheritable Class RoutingExtension Implements IExtension(Of ServiceHostBase)

Docs.summary: Provides run-time access to the routing service to allow dynamic modification of the routing configuration.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ApplyConfiguration(class System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration routingConfiguration) cil managed

Docs.param: The routing configuration to be applied.
Docs.summary: Applies a new to a running instance of the routing service.

remarks.format:
## Remarks After calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingExtension.ApplyConfiguration%2A>, the new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration> only applies to new sessions and messages.
> [!WARNING] > Do not modify the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration> object after calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingExtension.ApplyConfiguration%2A>, as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration> does not provide thread-safe updates or extensions. > > If you must perform subsequent updates of the routing configuration, use a new instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration> for each update.
